name: Kōyō
public_notice: No trading activity recorded by exchanges integrated on CoinGecko in the past 2 months
additional_notices: No active trades are found for this coin. Please submit a ticket at %{link} if you think this is an error.

description.en: Kōyō is the first next-generation AMM protocol in the Boba ecosystem. It is inspired by Curve and Balancer. At its core it's a decentralized exchange (DEX) that minimizes unnecessary losses from swaps between assets of equal value.
